name: Reverse
overview: Reverse is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Intersoft, which was released in Europe in 1993.A Reversi or Othello variant played on a 16x16 grid. There is no music. You will play in contemplative silence against the computer, only interrupted by clicking sounds as more and more spaces on the board are claimed. Released via mail-order catalogue, on CD-ROM collections like Gamer's Delight 2.
